title: Jeff Glucker (Shift Talkers!)
description:
Jeff Glucker is an automotive journalist and one of our oldest freinds. He founded Hooniverse, has worked for Kelley Blue Book, Automobile, and countless others. Now he has a new show on Motor Trend called "Shift Talkers", which is a panel show featuring all of your favorite names in the automotive space. 

Check out Shift Talkers! https://www.motortrendondemand.com/show/shift-talkers/3642/

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @hooniversejeff

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/1rhP8tPIh08
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
